revised_title: An Extraordinary Case of Three Swallowed Pins and Their Discharge
tldr: A girl swallowed three pins, which remained in her oesophagus for weeks before being removed. She experienced pain, inflammation, and difficulty breathing. Later, the pins were discharged from a small wound on her shoulder. This case study explores the girl's symptoms, the possible paths of the pins, and the effects on her body.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical Case Study
